about_the_game:
YOUR DECISION, YOUR ENDING

Dive into the mysteries of the Dreaming City and discover who you truly are—melancholic, choleric, sanguine, or phlegmatic? Every choice you make will reveal hidden traits of your personality. The enigmatic disappearance of Aoi will lead you to confront not only the city's secrets but also the riddles of your own soul.

UNRAVEL MYSTERIES AND DISCOVER YOURSELF

Every puzzle you solve is a step closer to understanding yourself. Will you approach challenges with fiery determination like a choleric, or with calm reflection like a melancholic? It’s all in your hands.

A CITY THAT TESTS YOUR CHARACTER

Charming locals and dangerous secrets—can you resist temptation and stay focused on your quest? The path you choose shapes your destiny.

Are you ready to step into this visual world where every decision reveals a part of who you are?

content_descriptors.notes: Buyers should be aware that this game contains adult content, including episodic scenes of a sexual nature, crime scenes, and battles without graphic violence. Please ensure that you are comfortable with this type of content before purchasing the game. It is recommended for mature audiences only, and players should be prepared for content appropriate for this category.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 or later
  • Processor: Intel 3rd generation Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: DREAMING CITY

subs.option_text: The Dreaming City Chronicles: Quest for the Vanished World - $4.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Explore the mysteries of your soul to discover whether you're melancholic, choleric, sanguine, or phlegmatic. Each decision reflects your inner world, challenging your perception and revealing the hidden depths of your personality in this journey of self-discovery.
